home.highlightsFound: A total of {count} highlight was found | A total of {count} highlights were found
home.errorsFound: A total of {count} error was found | A total of {count} errors were found
home.savedBooks: A total of {count} book was saved | A total of {count} books were saved
home.noNewBooksSaved: No new books were found during the process
home.savedHighlights: A total of {count} highlight was saved | A total of {count} highlights were saved
home.noNewHighlightsSaved: No new highlights were found during the process

userGuide.stepOne: Connect your Kindle to your computer via USB.
userGuide.stepTwo: Look for the file "My Clippings.txt", it is usually located in the "documents" folder of your Kindle's internal memory.
userGuide.stepThree: Save the file in a folder on your computer.
userGuide.stepFour: Select the file on the application's main page and click continue; wait for the import of your appointments to finish.
userGuide.info: That's it! You'll need to repeat this process whenever you want to update your highlights in the app. Afterward, you can assign covers to your books, as well as edit their titles, authors, and synopses. Remember that you can also edit your highlights, copy them for easy sharing, and delete them if necessary.

library.emptyBooksTable: Oops! There's no books saved. Try to load them on the home section.
library.bookDeletionAlert: Are you sure you want to delete the following book? Once permanently deleted, it cannot be recovered (except by loading My Clippings.txt from the home area).
library.bookRestorationAlert: Are you sure you want to restore the following book?

highlights.highlightDeletionAlert: Are you sure you want to delete the following highlight / quote? Once permanently deleted, it cannot be recovered (except by loading My Clippings.txt from the home area).
highlights.highlightRestorationAlert: Are you sure you want to restore the following highlight / quote?

settings.cleanUnusedCoversAlert: You are about to delete unused book covers; this action cannot be reversed. WARNING: This action will delete all unused files inside the covers directory. Do you wish to continue?
settings.coverCleanupCompleted: A total of {count} unused book cover was removed | A total of {count} unused book covers were removed

errors.bookSaveFailed: An error occurred while saving the book, please try again
errors.loadBooksFailed: An error occurred while loading books. Details: {error}
errors.highlightSaveFailed: An error occurred while saving the highlight, please try again
errors.loadHighlightsFailed: An error occurred while loading highlights. Details: {error}
errors.bookDeleteFailed: An error occurred while deleting the book, please try again. Details: {error}
errors.highlightDeleteFailed: An error occurred while deleting the highlight / quote, please try again. Details: {error}
errors.bookRestoreFailed: An error occurred while restoring the book, please try again. Details: {error}
errors.highlightRestoreFailed: An error occurred while restoring the highlight / quote, please try again. Details: {error}
errors.coverCleanupFailed: An error occurred while deleting unused book covers, please try again. Details: {error}
errors.parsingError: An error occurred while parsing the file, please try again. Details: {error}
